verses.text: \w I|strong="H3117"\w* love \w You|strong="H3605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* fortress, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* deliverer. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w I|strong="H3068"\w* take refuge, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* shield, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* horn \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* stronghold.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* call upon \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* worthy \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* praised; so \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* saved \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies.
\w The|strong="H3068"\w* cords \w of|strong="H3068"\w* death encompassed \w me|strong="H7121"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* torrents \w of|strong="H3068"\w* chaos overwhelmed \w me|strong="H7121"\w*.
\w The|strong="H4194"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H5158"\w* Sheol entangled me; \w the|strong="H4194"\w* snares \w of|strong="H5158"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* confronted me.

\w In|strong="H7585"\w* \w my|strong="H5437"\w* distress \w I|strong="H4194"\w* called upon \w the|strong="H5437"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w I|strong="H4194"\w* cried \w to|strong="H5437"\w* \w my|strong="H5437"\w* God \w for|strong="H4170"\w* help. \w From|strong="H5437"\w* \w His|strong="H5437"\w* temple \w He|strong="H4194"\w* heard \w my|strong="H5437"\w* voice, \w and|strong="H5437"\w* \w my|strong="H5437"\w* cry \w for|strong="H4170"\w* \w His|strong="H5437"\w* help reached \w His|strong="H5437"\w* ears.

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth shook \w and|strong="H3068"\w* quaked, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* foundations \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains trembled; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* shaken \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* burned \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w anger|strong="H6440"\w*.

Smoke rose \w from|strong="H2022"\w* \w His|strong="H3588"\w* nostrils, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* consuming fire came \w from|strong="H2022"\w* \w His|strong="H3588"\w* mouth; glowing coals blazed forth.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* parted \w the|strong="H4480"\w* heavens \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* down \w with|strong="H5927"\w* dark clouds \w beneath|strong="H4480"\w* \w His|strong="H4480"\w* feet.

\w He|strong="H7272"\w* mounted \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cherub \w and|strong="H8064"\w* flew; \w He|strong="H7272"\w* soared \w on|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* wings \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* wind.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H7307"\w* darkness \w His|strong="H5921"\w* hiding place, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* storm clouds \w a|strong="H3068"\w* canopy \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w From|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* brightness \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w His|strong="H7896"\w* presence \w His|strong="H7896"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* advanced— hailstones \w and|strong="H4325"\w* coals \w of|strong="H4325"\w* fire.\f + \fr 18:12 \ft Or bolts of lightning; also in verse 13\f*

\w The|strong="H5674"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* thundered \w from|strong="H5674"\w* heaven; \w the|strong="H5674"\w* voice \w of|strong="H1513"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* Most High resounded— \w hailstones|strong="H1259"\w* \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* \w of|strong="H1513"\w* \w fire|strong="H1513"\w*.\f + \fr 18:13 \ft Most Hebrew manuscripts; some Hebrew manuscripts and LXX do not include—hailstones and coals of fire; see 2 Samuel 22:14.\f*

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* shot \w His|strong="H5414"\w* arrows \w and|strong="H3068"\w* scattered \w the|strong="H5414"\w* foes; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* hurled lightning \w and|strong="H3068"\w* routed \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7971"\w* channels \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* sea appeared, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* foundations \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* world were exposed, \w at|strong="H7971"\w* \w Your|strong="H7971"\w* rebuke, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w at|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* blast \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* breath \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w Your|strong="H7971"\w* nostrils.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* reached down \w from|strong="H1540"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* high \w and|strong="H3068"\w* took hold \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* drew \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w deep|strong="H1540"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7971"\w* rescued \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w powerful|strong="H7227"\w* enemy, \w from|strong="H7971"\w* foes \w too|strong="H7227"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* confronted \w me|strong="H8130"\w* \w in|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* day \w of|strong="H4480"\w* calamity, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* was \w my|strong="H5337"\w* support.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* out \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* open; \w He|strong="H3117"\w* rescued \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w He|strong="H3117"\w* delighted \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* rewarded \w me|strong="H3318"\w* according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* righteousness; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* repaid \w me|strong="H3318"\w* according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cleanness \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* hands.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* kept \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ways \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* wickedly departed \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H8104"\w* ordinances \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w disregarded|strong="H3808"\w* \w His|strong="H8104"\w* statutes.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* blameless \w before|strong="H4480"\w* \w Him|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* kept myself \w from|strong="H4480"\w* iniquity.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* repaid \w me|strong="H5973"\w* according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* righteousness, according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* cleanness \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* hands \w in|strong="H8549"\w* \w His|strong="H8104"\w* sight.

\w To|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* faithful \w You|strong="H7725"\w* show Yourself faithful, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* blameless \w You|strong="H7725"\w* show Yourself blameless;

\w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* pure \w You|strong="H5973"\w* \w show|strong="H8552"\w* \w Yourself|strong="H2616"\w* pure, \w but|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* crooked \w You|strong="H5973"\w* \w show|strong="H8552"\w* \w Yourself|strong="H2616"\w* shrewd.
\w For|strong="H5973"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w* save an afflicted people, \w but|strong="H6617"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w* humble \w those|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* haughty eyes.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, light \w my|strong="H7311"\w* lamp; \w my|strong="H7311"\w* God lights \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* darkness.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* can charge \w an|strong="H3588"\w* army, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* can scale \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wall.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w His|strong="H3588"\w* way \w is|strong="H3588"\w* perfect; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H1416"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* flawless. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield \w to|strong="H7323"\w* all \w who|strong="H3588"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w Him|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* besides \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Rock except \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* arms \w me|strong="H1107"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H6697"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* way clear.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w makes|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* feet \w like|strong="H1870"\w* those \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deer \w and|strong="H1870"\w* stations \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* heights.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* trains \w my|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w for|strong="H5921"\w* battle; \w my|strong="H5921"\w* arms \w can|strong="H5975"\w* bend \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* bronze.

\w You|strong="H3925"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H3925"\w* \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* shield \w of|strong="H3027"\w* salvation; \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upholds \w me|strong="H3925"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* gentleness exalts \w me|strong="H3925"\w*.\f + \fr 18:35 \ft Or and Your help exalts me or and You stoop down to make me great\f*

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* broaden \w the|strong="H5414"\w* path beneath \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* ankles do \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* way.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* pursued \w my|strong="H8478"\w* enemies \w and|strong="H8478"\w* overtook \w them|strong="H8478"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* turn back until \w they|strong="H3808"\w* were consumed.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* crushed \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rise; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* fallen under \w my|strong="H7725"\w* feet.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H7272"\w* armed \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H6965"\w* strength \w for|strong="H8478"\w* battle; \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H7272"\w* subdued \w my|strong="H6965"\w* foes \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w You|strong="H8478"\w* \w have|strong="H2428"\w* made \w my|strong="H6965"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w* retreat \w before|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H3766"\w*; \w I|strong="H6965"\w* put \w an|strong="H6965"\w* end \w to|strong="H6965"\w* those \w who|strong="H4421"\w* hated \w me|strong="H3766"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5414"\w* \w cried|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* help, but there \w was|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* one \w to|strong="H5414"\w* save \w them|strong="H5414"\w*— \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, but \w He|strong="H5414"\w* did \w not|strong="H5414"\w* answer.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* ground \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* dust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* face \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wind; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* trampled \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \f + \fr 18:42 \ft Some Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, and Syriac (see also 2 Samuel 22:43); MT I poured them out\f* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* mud \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* streets.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* delivered \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* strife \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* people; \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H7307"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w*; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* people \w I|strong="H5921"\w* had \w not|strong="H6440"\w* known \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* \w serve|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* hear \w me|strong="H7760"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w obey|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*; \w foreigners|strong="H1471"\w* cower \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*.
\w Foreigners|strong="H1121"\w* lose \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* come trembling \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* strongholds.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* lives, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* blessed \w be|strong="H1121"\w* my Rock! \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* my salvation \w be|strong="H1121"\w* exalted—
\w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* avenges \w me|strong="H7311"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* subdues nations beneath \w me|strong="H7311"\w*,

\w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w delivers|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* enemies. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* exalt \w me|strong="H5414"\w* above \w my|strong="H5414"\w* foes; \w You|strong="H5414"\w* rescue \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* violent \w men|strong="H5971"\w*.

Therefore \w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H2555"\w* \w praise|strong="H7311"\w* \w You|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* nations; \w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H2555"\w* sing praises \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w Your|strong="H4480"\w* name.\f + \fr 18:49 \ft Cited in Romans 15:9\f*

Great salvation \w He|strong="H3651"\w* brings \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*. \w He|strong="H3651"\w* shows loving devotion \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* anointed, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* David \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* descendants forever.
